Question
========
The electrical power, _P_ dissipated in a resistor of resistance _R_ when a current _I_ passes through the resistor is given by

<center>
_P_ = _I_^2^_R_
</center>

What is the unit of _R_ expressed in base units?

Answerlist
----------
* kg^-1^ m^-2^ s^-1^ A
* kg m^2^ s^-2^ A^-2^
* kg m^2^ s^-3^ A^-2^
* W A^-2^
